price: Бе гумон, дар ин [сухан ибрату] паёми равшане барои парастишгарон аст
arabic: إِنَّ فِي هَٰذَا لَبَلَٰغٗا لِّقَوۡمٍ عَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna fī hādhā labalāghan liqawmin ʿābidīna
